[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos10.flickr.com/12043276_36a4d2bae7.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/12043276/ "photo sharing") [Scenes from the bus](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/12043276/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I’ve started a new project for myself: scenes from a bus. The idea is to grab slices of life as seen from the bus. I catch a bus as part of my daily commute, so there should be plenty of opportunities. Wish me luck�
